data.name: The Story Goes On - The Original Samtrack
data.detailed_description:
A brilliant orchestral composition with 22 original, loopable tracks created by Sam L. Jones (Eclipse JP) for The Story Goes On.

Track Listing:


1. Main Theme - 02:23
2. Forest - 02:26
3. Forest Calmer - 02:26
4. Snow - 02:07
5. Snow Calmer - 02:07
6. Spooky - 02:24
7. Desert - 02:28
8. Desert Calmer - 02:28
9. Dark Forest - 02:26
10. Dark Forest Calmer - 02:26
11. Void - 02:07
12. Void Calmer - 02:07
13. Boss Battle - 01:30
14. Battle - 01:35
15. Forest Dungeon - 01:47
16. Snow Dungeon - 02:29
17. Spooky Dungeon - 01:54
18. Desert Dungeon - 01:33
19. Dark Forest Dungeon - 01:38
20. Scarecrow Battle - 01:46
21. Scarecrow Chase - 01:05
22. Game Closer - 01:59

data.short_description: The Original Samtrack to The Story Goes On by the musical mastermind Sam L. Jones. Features all in-game songs with all their individual variants.
data.reviews:
“The soundtrack that accompanies all this is quite frankly brilliant too...”
The Xbox Hub
